lineFollowerSim

Class VP

  • java.lang.Object
    • lineFollowerSim.VP

  • public class VP
extends java.lang.Object
    Very light-weight rectangular viewport for Course,Robot,Sensor and other views defined in screen absolute coordinates where the origin (0,0) is located at upper-left corner of screen. The positive X axis is directed to the right, and positive Y axis, down.

    Note: In processing, the screen size can be determined by reading width and height variables which are defined at start of program execution by size method call in setup or settings method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VP

        public VP(int x,
          int y,
          int w,
          int h)
        Parameters:
        x - upper-left X pixel location offset from screen origin (0,0) at top-left of screen
        y - upper-left Y pixel location
        w - width in pixels
        h - height in pixels

    • Method Detail

      • pointInside

        public boolean pointInside(int x1,
                           int y1)
        Determine if point (x1,y1) is inside viewport rectangle
        Parameters:
        x1 - horizontal offset from left side of screen
        y1 - vertical offset from top of screen
        Returns:
        true if point inside viewport

      • get

        public VP get()
        Get a copy of current viewport parameters
        Returns:
        safe copy of viewport data, does not allow modification of x,y,w,h values
